violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided name 'Денис' at 28.222s. Operator used the name ('Денис, подскажите, пожалуйста, еще раз город.') but did not repeat it back with confirmation request ('Верно?') and did not receive explicit confirmation from customer.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Search announced at 2:02.082 ('Сейчас я посмотрю, подойдет ли он на хавейл. Минуту, пожалуйста.'). Information delivery began at 3:11.792 ('Ну, 34-35 для 18 дюймовых.'). Total duration approximately 70 seconds, exceeding 45-second threshold.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After second search completion (70+ seconds), operator delivered information but did not thank customer for waiting. First search was properly thanked ('Благодарю вас за ожидание' at 1:06.738), but second longer search was not.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides their name, must repeat it back and ask for explicit confirmation: 'Денис, верно?' and wait for customer confirmation 'Да'
Keep information searches under 40 seconds. If complex lookup needed, provide more frequent check-ins to customer and consider offering callback option for extended research.
Always thank customer for waiting after information search, especially after longer searches: 'Спасибо за ожидание' or 'Благодарю вас за ожидание'

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name '74 Колеса', operator name 'Александра', and offer to help 'Как можно к вам обращаться?'. Proper closing 'Всего доброго, до свидания'. Customer orientation question 'Чем-то ещё можно помочь?' present.

7.2.evidence: Name 'Денис' collected without echo method confirmation

7.3.evidence: Intro at 1.662s (<5s requirement), disconnect timing compliant

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45s. Call completed normally by mutual agreement.

9.1.evidence: Second search duration 70 seconds exceeded 45-second threshold
9.1.note: First search at 19 seconds was compliant. Second search violated.

9.3.evidence: No thank you after second search (first search was properly thanked)
9.3.note: Operator thanked for first search but not second longer search

3.1.evidence: Customer inquiry about wheel disks fully addressed. Product codes, specifications, pricing, and availability provided. Customer chose to think about purchase - decision not resolution failure.

3.6.evidence: Operator consistently checked system before providing information ('сейчас посмотрю')

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: product codes (R306-903, R327693), specifications (вылет 34), price (14400), availability (завтра), color (черный с серебристыми вставками)

10.2.evidence: Logical presentation of information, proper script flow, professional information delivery

10.3.evidence: Consistent use of customer name 'Денис', good rapport building, maintained conversation control, proper opening/closing

10.6.evidence: Accurate and complete product information delivered confidently
10.6.note: Partial assessment without full project config

2.1.evidence: No service refusal or call dropout. Call ended professionally with customer agreement.

1.1.evidence: No rudeness, profanity, or harsh language detected in transcript

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative throughout. No difficult customer handling issues.

positive_observations: Professional and complete greeting with company name and operator identification
Consistently used customer name 'Денис' throughout conversation
Proactive in helping customer find correct product specifications
Offered to dictate product codes when customer couldn't find items on website
Patient and collaborative approach during complex product search
Proper closing with customer orientation question 'Чем-то ещё можно помочь?'
Thanked customer for waiting after first search with 'Благодарю вас за ожидание'
Offered to make reservation to help customer think about decision

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available for precise echo method detection. Some timestamps in conversation show collaborative searching which complicated search duration assessment.
